entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Lac-Mégantic
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:10 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
